commentBody: Sir -- If you are going to write about the NFL then you simply must get with the program and up your use of the word "football".  Here are some edits to show you how we all do it, in every announcing booth at every stadium in every state in the country.  "Preposterous Punt. Trailing 24-10 with 2:08 remaining IN THE FOOTBALL GAME, the Carolina Panthers FOOTBALL TEAM punted THE FOOTBALL. Sure it was fourth-and-24, but they were down two scores with two minutes to go in the FOOTBALL GAME and punted THE FOOTBALL! Drastic measures were the only hope at that juncture OF THE FOOTBALL GAME. When the FOOTBALL bounced around then went out of bounds ON THE FOOTBALL FIELD at 1:57 LEFT IN THE FOOTBALL GAME, that even cost Carolina'S FOOTBALL TEAM the two-minute-warning clock stoppage."  See it's easy...
